name: 2024 12th International Conference on Smart Grid and Clean Energy Technologies
content: Publication: 1\. All papers registered to ICSGCE will be published into Conference Proceedings by IEEE, which will be included into IEEE Xplore, submitted for Ei Compendex and Scopus, like last few years. (Conference Record #63738) 2\. Alternatively, the authors can select to publish their papers in Scopus indexed journal: IJEETC (ISSN: 2319-2518) http://www.ijeetc.com/
